titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to include Charleston Harbor, South Carolina, in the National estuary program.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Executive Comment Requested from EPA, OMB.
Referred to Subcommittee on Water Resources.

bill.summary: 3/9/1988--Introduced. Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to give priority consideration to the inclusion of Charleston Harbor, South Carolina, in the National Estuary program.
